1.0.name: wordpress/deepnet
1.0.description:
The Deepnet Wordpress Plugin allows Wordpress publishers to quickly and easily insert any Ad of their choosing anywhere in their Blog. Monetize your blog like never before. Right now, Amazon Affiliate Ads are the sole category of advertising available in our database. However, the Ad content of our database is set to grow exponentially in the incoming few months.

Using the Deepnet plugin could not be any easier. Go to your blog from any computer. If you are not logged in, then login by toggling login mode (ctrl+x). Once logged in, go to any page of your blog. Toggle Ad Insertion mode by hitting ctrl+x. An option to insert an Ad will appear next to each and every paragraph. Select the paragraph where you would like the Ad to go, and click Insert_Ad. Search our Ad database using the set of keywords that best describes the content of that particle post. A preview of all appropriate ads will be returned in the search results. Select the Ad that you like best and it will instantl
